alert.note: Alert for Carter; Greene; Washington (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 3:18PM CDT until May 21 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Washington County in east Tennessee... East central Greene County in east Tennessee... West central Carter County in east Tennessee... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 417 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tusculum, or 8 miles east of Greeneville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Johnson City, Greeneville, Elizabethton, Jonesborough, Tusculum, Oak Grove, Central, Midway, Pine Crest and Gray. This includes Interstate 26 in Tennessee between mile markers 13 and 27. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
